original: Berggren, Hilding Fredrik, kyrkoh., kontraktsprost, Björisäter, f. 20/10/90 i Tillberga, Västmanl. 1., av kyrkoh. A. F. B. o. Gunhild Lindstedt. G. 31 m. Dagmar Källgård. Barn: Birgitta f. 33. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 10, teol. fil. ex. 11, teol. kand. samt prakt. teol. prov 14, prästv. f. Linköp. stift 15, folksk:lär :ex. 16. V. kommin. samt pastiadj. i Ekeby resp. Kullerstad 15, v. pastor i Gamleby 16, förest, o. förste lär. v. Östads barnhus 19, kommin. i Vena 20, kyrkoh. i Björsäter sed. 23, kontr :prost i Bankekinds o. Skärkinds kontr. sed. 42. Ordf. i kyrkostämma, kyrkoråd, skolst^^r. samt i stift. Björsäters församl:hem.
translated: Berggren, Hilding Fredrik, clergyman, dean, Björisäter, born on October 20th, 1890 in Tillberga, Västmanland County, son of clergyman A. F. B. and Gunhild Lindstedt. Married in 1931 to Dagmar Källgård. Children: Birgitta born in 1933. He completed his high school studies in Uppsala in 1910, theological studies in 1911, received a theological degree as well as practical theological training in 1914, and was ordained as a priest in the Linköping diocese in 1915. He obtained his teaching certificate in 1916. He served as assistant pastor and deacon in Ekeby and Kullerstad in 1915, assistant pastor in Gamleby in 1916, head and first teacher of Östad's orphanage in 1919, chaplain in Vena in 1920, vicar in Björsäter since 1923, and dean of the Bankekinds and Skärkinds deaneries since 1942. He was chairman of the church meeting, church council, school board and the Björsäter parish.

employmentHistory.title: Head and first teacher of Östad's orphanage
Dean of Bankekinds and Skärkinds deaneries
